snippet.title: #BLUD - Official Trailer | IGN Fan Fest 2024
snippet.description:
Save your friends, fight off the vampire apocalypse, and survive the horrors of freshman field hockey practice in #BLUD, a delightfully zany animated dungeon crawler that blurs the line between action RPGs and hyperkinetic 90s cartoons. This hand-drawn vampire adventure can be wishlisted on Steam now.

#IGN #Gaming #IGNFanFest
